00008 #include "vhdlcomponentdeclaration.h"
00009 
00010 #include "vhdlgenerator2.h"

00016 VhdlComponentDeclaration::VhdlComponentDeclaration( QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00017                                                                                                    VhdlGenerator2* parent ):
00018 QObject(parent),
00019 parent_(parent),
00020 component_(component),
00021 typeName_(component->getVlnv()->getName()),
00022 generics_(),
00023 ports_(),
00024 instantations_() {
00025 
00026         Q_ASSERT(parent);
00027         Q_ASSERT(component);
00028         connect(this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00029                 parent, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00030         connect(this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00031                 parent, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00032 
00033         // parse the generics for the component declaration
00034         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > modelParams = component_->getModelParameters();
00035         foreach (QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modelParam, modelParams) {
00036                 QSharedPointer<VhdlGeneric> generic(new VhdlGeneric(this, modelParam.data()));
00037                 generics_.insert(generic->name(), generic);
00038         }
00039 
00040         // parse the ports for the component declaration
00041         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > ports = component_->getPorts();
00042         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, ports) {
00043                 
00044                 // do not add ports with invalid direction or phantom direction
00045                 if (port->getDirection() == General::DIRECTION_INVALID ||
00046                         port->getDirection() == General::DIRECTION_PHANTOM) {
00047                         continue;
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 // create the actual port
00051                 QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> vhdlPort(new VhdlPort(this, port.data()));
00052 
00053                 // create the sorter instance
00054                 VhdlPortSorter sorter(component_->getInterfaceNameForPort(vhdlPort->name()),
00055                         vhdlPort->name(), port->getDirection());
00056 
00057                 // this port can not be created yet
00058                 Q_ASSERT(!ports_.contains(sorter));
00059 
00060                 ports_.insert(sorter, vhdlPort);
00061         }
00062 }
00063 
00064 VhdlComponentDeclaration::~VhdlComponentDeclaration() {
00065 }
00066 
00067 void VhdlComponentDeclaration::write( QTextStream& stream ) const {
00068         // if component contains a description
00069         if (!description().isEmpty()) {
00070                 stream << "\t";
00071                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(description(), stream, QString("\t"));
00072         }
00073 
00074         stream << "\tcomponent " << typeName_ << endl;
00075 
00076         // write the generic declarations
00077         if (!generics_.isEmpty()) {
00078                 stream << "\t\tgeneric (" << endl;
00079                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<VhdlGeneric> >::const_iterator i = generics_.begin(); i != generics_.end(); ++i) {
00080                         stream << "\t\t\t";
00081                         i.value()->write(stream);
00082 
00083                         // if this is not the last generic to write
00084                         if (i + 1 != generics_.end()) {
00085                                 stream << ";";
00086                         }
00087 
00088                         if (!i.value()->description().isEmpty()) {
00089                                 stream << " ";
00090                                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(i.value()->description(), stream);
00091                         }
00092                         else {
00093                                 stream << endl;
00094                         }
00095                 }
00096                 stream << endl << "\t\t);" << endl;
00097         }
00098 
00099         // write the port declarations
00100         if (!ports_.isEmpty()) {
00101                 stream << "\t\tport (" << endl;
00102                 QString previousInterface;
00103                 for (QMap<VhdlPortSorter, QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> >::const_iterator i = ports_.begin(); i != ports_.end(); ++i) {
00104                         
00105                         // if the port is first in the interface then introduce it
00106                         if (i.key().interface() != previousInterface) {
00107                                 const QString interfaceName = i.key().interface();
00108 
00109                                 stream << endl << "\t\t\t-- ";
00110 
00111                                 if (interfaceName == QString("none")) {
00112                                         stream << "These ports are not in any interface" << endl;
00113                                 }
00114                                 else if (interfaceName == QString("several")) {
00115                                         stream << "There ports are contained in many interfaces" << endl;
00116                                 }
00117                                 else {  
00118                                         stream << "Interface: " << interfaceName << endl;
00119                                         const QString description = component_->getInterfaceDescription(
00120                                                 interfaceName);
00121                                         if (!description.isEmpty()) {
00122                                                 stream << "\t\t\t";
00123                                                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(description, stream, QString("\t\t\t"));
00124                                         }
00125                                 }
00126                                 previousInterface = interfaceName;
00127                         }
00128                         
00129                         stream << "\t\t\t";
00130                         i.value()->write(stream);
00131 
00132                         // if this is not the last port to write
00133                         if (i + 1 != ports_.end()) {
00134                                 stream << ";";
00135                         }
00136 
00137                         if (!i.value()->description().isEmpty()) {
00138                                 stream << " ";
00139                                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(i.value()->description(), stream);
00140                         }
00141                         else {
00142                                 stream << endl;
00143                         }
00144                 }
00145                 stream << endl << "\t\t);" << endl;
00146         }
00147 
00148         stream << "\tend component;" << endl;
00149 }

00163 void VhdlComponentDeclaration::addInstantiation( 
00164         QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance ) {
00165 
00166         Q_ASSERT(!instantations_.contains(instance));
00167 
00168         instantations_.append(instance);
00169 }

00171 bool VhdlComponentDeclaration::hasGeneric( const QString& genericName ) const {
00172         return generics_.contains(genericName);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void VhdlComponentDeclaration::checkPortConnections() {
00176         // check each vhdl port
00177         foreach (QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> port, ports_) {
00178                 
00179                 // check each instance of this type
00180                 foreach (QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instantation, instantations_) {
00181                         
00182                         // if the named port is connected in this instance
00183                         if (instantation->hasConnection(port->name())) {
00184                                 
00185                                 // port is needed so it can not be commented and search can be 
00186                                 // stopped for this port
00187                                 port->setCommented(false);
00188                                 break;
00189                         }
00190                 }
00191         }
00192 }
00193 
00194 QString VhdlComponentDeclaration::portType( const QString& portName ) const {
00195 
00196         // used to search for the correct port
00197         VhdlPortSorter sorter(component_->getInterfaceNameForPort(portName),
00198                 portName, component_->getPortDirection(portName));
00199         
00200         // if the named port is found
00201         if (ports_.contains(sorter)) {
00202                 return ports_.value(sorter)->type();
00203         }
00204         else {
00205                 return QString("undefined port");
00206         }
00207 }
00208 
00209 bool VhdlComponentDeclaration::isScalarPort( const QString& portName ) const {
00210 
00211         VhdlPortSorter sorter(component_->getInterfaceNameForPort(portName),
00212                 portName, component_->getPortDirection(portName));
00213 
00214         QString type;
00215 
00216         if (ports_.contains(sorter)) {
00217                 type = ports_.value(sorter)->type();
00218                 return VhdlGeneral::isScalarType(type);
00219         }
00220         // if port is not found then it is not scalar
00221         else {
00222                 return false;
00223         }
00224 }

00227         typeName_ = entityName;

00230 General::Direction VhdlComponentDeclaration::portDirection( const QString& portName ) const {
00231         return component_->getPortDirection(portName);
00232 }
